ol.li: Go onto your prefered web browser whether it be safari or google chrome. This allow you to access the website.

Type in the address bar "waveapps.com". It will bring you to the main page of the website.
Once you are on the homepage the first thing you willl see is a way to signup
Fill out the information required, your email and a password. Click Create your free account. You will want to write this down somewhere so you can remember it.
Once you create your free account, it will ask for your name, business name, and what your business does. Fill all of it out.
After you click Next, you will be able to choose a starting point. You will have four options to pick from. Pick the option that works the best for you personally.
After the option was selected, answer the final question if you are currently in business and click Get started

body.p: Once you click get started, your account will get created and you will be able to fully utilize all the features of Wave Financial.
If you have already made an account, you can go straight to the launchpad for your needs.
